name: spo-delete-orphaned-temporary-sitepages
title: Delete orphaned temporary pages from Site Pages
shortDescription: Script to clean up temporary pages from Site Pages library
longDescription: Script to clean up orphaned temporary pages from Site Pages (/sitepages) library. For example zz5yfe8u.aspx.

thumbnails.alt: An image showing orphaned temporary pages in a Site Pages library.

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
